title: IMirrorComponentFeatureData.DimXpertScheme
description: Gets or sets whether to copy the DimXpert scheme of the original components to the opposite-hand versions.
returns: True to copy the DimXpert scheme, false (default) to not
remarks:
This property is valid only if:
IMirrorComponentFeatureData::CreateDerivedConfigurations
is false,
- and -
IMirrorComponentFeatureData::BreakLinksToOriginalPart
is false.
